pr_title: changelog for bug where rpc authentication would be enabled even if a credentials file was specified

timeline.message:
changelog for bug where rpc authentication would be enabled even if it was disabled if a credentials file was specified

Signed-off-by: Jason Frame <jasonwframe@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: is #452 and 454 meant to be the same number?
timeline.author: rain-on
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,6 +6,7 @@
 ### Bug Fixes
 
 - [BESU-25](https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/BESU-25) Use v5 Devp2p when pinging [\#392](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/392)
+- Rpc authentication would be enabled even if it was disabled in configuration if a credentials file was specified [\#452](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/454)

timeline.bodyText: reword? Specifying credentials file should not force RPC Authentication to be enabled (i.e. it should not override the rpc-auth-enabled configuration item).
timeline.author: rain-on
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,6 +6,7 @@
 ### Bug Fixes
 
 - [BESU-25](https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/BESU-25) Use v5 Devp2p when pinging [\#392](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/392)
+- Rpc authentication would be enabled even if it was disabled in configuration if a credentials file was specified [\#452](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/454)

timeline.message:
fix issue number
